Projects

Eventex

Events & Conference WebApp

Backend

Eventex use Django as backend and was develop using Test Driven Development (TDD) during a Python course with Henrique Bastos.

Frontend

As frontend we used HTML5 + Custom CSS, the template engine Jinja2 was used to allowed fast development and DRY.

Deploy

The Django app was deployed on Heroku platform using GIT and Heroku CLI, and has used Postgres as database.

Show me the code

You can see the app working on Heroku or get the source code on the Github.
